sentences.sContent: The proposals are an attempt to rid the country of political corruption.
sentences.sCn: 这些提议是使该国摆脱政治腐败的一种尝试。

sentences.sContent: ...Some people with HSAM find it very hard to get rid of unpleasant memories...

trans.tranCn: 使摆脱， 解除…的负担， 从…中清除
trans.tranOther: If you rid a place or person of something undesirable or unwanted, you succeed in removing it completely from that place or person
